entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with showers except flurries over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
